tool_description: Github Data Scraper is a great way to get access to Github repos
title: Leo Github API Scraper

api_list.name: Get the top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.description: Get the top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leo-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/{query}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leo-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get list of Github repo for ruby web scrapping
api_list.description: Get list of Github repo for ruby web scrapping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leo-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/repos"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leo-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
